title: With cinderhulk nerfed, un-nerf sejuani?
body: She still has a high winrate in Bronze, but her winrate in Plat+ is low, and the game is supposedly balanced for Plat+

replies.body: The passive isn't what made sej broken.. It's the fact that she scales off health and cinder hulk is basically a deathcap for her(25% increase health). She still is a beast utility kinglet just not a god tank that deals mid lane damage.
now is 15% bonus health... But I'm agree I want her un-nerf-

hyperbole

She still is a beast utility kinglet just not a god tank that deals mid lane damage.
